name: Pretty Sarah
descriptions: Pretty Sarah is the pimp of the Casa Madrid Apartments in Westside in 2281.

Although it may seem odd for a woman to be pimping prostitutes, for Sarah it is just a way to earn money. The wasteland and the hardship she suffered made her tough as nails and capable of taking whatever comes her way.
She is not deflective of her past; she downright avoids the topic, and for good reason.

topics.response_text: {Player in combat}Leave me out of your fight!
{Non-Dummy}Three flavors to choose from - Sweetie, Maude, and Jimmy. Sweetie's the house favorite, for reasons that should be obvious.

topics.topic_text: You sure know how to make a girl feel welcome.
topics.response_text: Just needed to make the situation clear is all. How can I help you?
So long as we understand each other.

topics.topic: VCasaSarahDSJKillExplainI found this in Dermot's room. <Show her Dermot's ledger.>
topics.topic_text: I found this in Dermot's room. <Show her Dermot's ledger.>
topics.response_text: {tentative}I'll take a look, just to see what sort of shit they were into.
That's right, we will. Anything I can help you with?

topics.topic_text: I'm not a whore, you ugly bitch.
topics.response_text: Then there's no problem here - and no need to get nasty. How can I help you?

topics.topic_text: I'm interested in learning more about Dermot and Saint James.
topics.response_text: They don't look like much, but they earn a pretty good living by selling scrap and salvage.

topics.topic_text: What do you do around here?
topics.response_text: I look after the only reasons anyone would want to spend any time here. I'm a pimp.

topics.topic_text: How did you get burned so badly?
topics.response_text: We don't talk about that. Next topic.

topics.topic_text: {Cook-Cook dead}You might be interested to know that I killed a fiend named Cook-Cook.
topics.response_text: You did? Well, that's one hell of a service to humanity, then.

topics.topic_text: Take a look at this ledger I found in Dermot's room.
topics.response_text: I'll take a look, but you better have a good reason for asking me to violate his privacy.
You know where to find me.

topics.topic_text: You're not one of the merchandise?
topics.response_text: Most of my body is scarred all over, like a ghoul. Nobody around who'd want to screw that. No, I just run things.

conversation.response_text: You know where to find me.
